Items.description: One of basic needs. Manage this propery or get starve all !
Fishing from here and get a chance for rare item !
Produce special food for temporary increase your character stats.
Research and unlock some cool technologies.
Set some characters here for more efficiency on building task.
Craft some medicine and let your characters carry them to the quest.
Quarantine site provide space for doing quarantine. Don't forget to take infected characeter here.
Increase max number of people in town. Something could happen if exactly two opposite gender characters work here . . .
Characters in this building will have permission for going outside the town. Explorations are waiting you !
All of items are stored here. The bigger, the more space.
Purified water is base requirement for living.
Explorations are not easy, unless you have some legendary items crafted from here !
Trading is first step for revitalize the economy.
Even post-apocalypse, gold still maintain it's value.
Back to basic, woods are essential material for building.
